lead_paragraph: The bank already paid $2 billion in a 2013 settlement with the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency, but did not meet all the obligations of that earlier settlement.

headline.main: JPMorgan Pays $48 Million More to Settle Mortgage Servicing Issues
